issue.title: Monsters with life points
issue.body:
# Monsters with life points

The monsters are evolving to make you the most complicated game!

> Cthulhu monster said: I will kill you!!!

 From now on you will have to take more into account the monsters resisting your attacks overtime, it will be more difficult for you to kill them.


## Improved attribute (HP)


The monsters are evolving! Now each of them will have life.

```
> look 
Crystal Beach
There is one of the most beautiful beaches. 
There is the mosquito monster.
Monster has 1 life points
Player has 16 life points.

```

If your attack is superior to the life of the monster you will kill him as usual as before.

```
> attack
Crystal Beach
There is one of the most beautiful beaches.
You killed the monster.
Player life points: 16.

```

Or another example:

```
> look 
Cupboard
You are at the main room of your home. 
There is the fly monster.
Monster has 15 life points
Player has 16 life points.

```
```
> attack
Cupboard
You are at the main room of your home. 
Monster has 3 life points
Player life points: 16.

```
```
> attack
Cupboard
You are at the main room of your home. 
You killed the monster.
Player life points: 16.

```

In case your attack does not exceed their life, the monster will lose as many points of life as your attacking force.

```
> look 
Barn
You are at the main room of your home. 
There is the Cthulhu monster.
Monster has 99 life points
Player has 16 life points.

> attack
Barn
You are at the main room of your home. 
You attacked the monster.
Monster has 89 life points
Player life points: 5.
```

In this situation you will have to decide what is best for you, if you continue attacking or continue looking for objects to improve your attack.

> Your game, your life. YOU DECIDE

# Monsters with life points

The monsters are evolving to make you the most complicated game!

> Cthulhu monster said: I will kill you!!!

 From now on you will have to take more into account the monsters resisting your attacks overtime, it will be more difficult for you to kill them.
